page.title: 08Local Services in Horwich
page.content: This area is well served by{buses, {shops}and other amenities. The majority of people have their{milk {delivered}to their home. Many people have{newspapers delivered,}these include free newspapers such as the {Horwich Advertiser}which is paid for by the advertisements in it. Many people walk to the shops since they are conveniently positioned. The majority of houses are also within walking distance of a{postbox.}The {doctors surgery}requires a short car or bus journey for most people. About one third of the people use the local{bus service}regularly, one third use it ocasionally and the final third not at all. Most people do their daily shopping in the local {Tesco Superstore}behind{St. Joseph's {School}while the rest shop in small local shops or Bolton centre.
